II.ii.2.C.2.d
.
Limitation of Filing Excessive Material in a Paper Claims Folder
Do not continue to file material in a single paper claims folder if the folder becomes bulky and unmanageable.  Generally, a paper claims folder volume should be limited to two or three inches in thickness.
Reference
:  For information on creating additional volumes of claims folders, see the attachment
Historical_M21-1III_ii_3_SecB_8-22-18
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C - Locked Files Folder Maintenance
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section C
